name: NEONomicon (itch)
description:
"EVEN IF YOU WERE EATEN, YOU HAVE TWO CHOICES..."

How often did you Wake up in a dark room, with no idea where you are or what to do next?
Two or three times?..
Well, not exactly more than ten times!

In this game, nobody tells you what to do – after all, it's simple: 
- Do not touch sharp objects
- Beware of strange creatures
- Don't go in the dark
For a start it's enough.

But to solve this puzzle you'll need something more than perseverance and reaction. 
More than observation and caution. 
More than determination and luck...
